name: Simple Statecraft Demo
description:
Welcome to this prototype of Simple Statecraft, a small project of mine! Done in about 3 days, it's something I just wanted to get out there to see if people like the concept and to have something finally done.

Simple Statecraft is quite short but has some minimal replay value, and if you think this project is somewhat interesting, I am planning on working on it more 

Play in full screen if you wanna read anything
